attributes.action: Make 2017 Women's Cricket World Cup Available On Free-To-Air TV
attributes.additional_details:
The Women's Cricket World Cup will be held in England in 2017.

It should be an event the whole country can share.

We petition that this competition be added to the 'A List' of events shown on free-to-air TV, so that all the nation's children can share in this inspirational celebration of women's sport.
